title: Are consumption-based CO₂ per capita emissions above or below the global average?
subtitle: [Consumption-based emissions](#dod:consumptionbasedemissions) are national emissions that have been adjusted for trade. This map denotes whether a country's average per capita emissions are above or below the value of global per capita emissions.
internalNotes: The "global per capita equity" means the value of "Per capita consumption-based CO₂ emissions" for the World on the latest year. This has to be manually updated every year. Simply go to that variable, check the value for World on the last year, and insert that value in the map brackets.
